sourcesContent:
<template>


  <PublicationSingle />



</template>



<script>

import PublicationSingle from '@/components/PublicationSingleTemplate.vue'

export default {
  components: {
    PublicationSingle
  },
  data() {
    return {
      publications: []

    };
  },
  created() {
    // http://localhost:3000/api/publications/all
    const options = {
      method: "GET",
      headers: {
        'Accept': 'application/json',
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        'Authorization': "Bearer " + sessionStorage.getItem("Token")
      },
    }
    fetch("http://localhost:3000/api/publications/:id", options)
      .then((response) => response.json())
      .then(data => {
        this.publications = data
        console.table(data);
      })
  }
}

}

</script>
